com.soa.messenger.wsf

Class WSFMessengerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.messenger.wsf.WSFMessengerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessengerService

    public class WSFMessengerService
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessengerService
    MessengerService implementation that uses the Web Service Framework to execute message exchanges. A global instance of the service is available through the static getInstance() accessor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExchangeFactory createExchangeFactory()
      Creates an ExchangeFactory for creating exchanges.
      ExchangeFactory createExchangeFactory(javax.xml.namespace.QName serviceName)
      Creates an ExchangeFactory for creating exchanges.
      ExchangeFactory createExchangeFactory(javax.xml.namespace.QName serviceName, java.lang.String endpointName)
      Creates an ExchangeFactory for creating exchanges.
      static WSFMessengerService getInstance()
      Provides access to the global instance of the messenger service.
      Messenger getMessenger()
      Returns a Messenger for executing message exchanges.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static WSFMessengerService getInstance()
        Provides access to the global instance of the messenger service.
        Returns:
        Global WSF messenger service.

      • getMessenger

        public Messenger getMessenger()
        Returns a Messenger for executing message exchanges.
        Specified by:
        getMessenger in interface MessengerService
        Returns:
        Messenger.

      • createExchangeFactory

        public ExchangeFactory createExchangeFactory()
        Creates an ExchangeFactory for creating exchanges. The exchanges will not be addressed.
        Specified by:
        createExchangeFactory in interface MessengerService
        Returns:
        ExchangeFactory

      • createExchangeFactory

        public ExchangeFactory createExchangeFactory(javax.xml.namespace.QName serviceName)
        Creates an ExchangeFactory for creating exchanges. The exchanges will be addressed to the given service.
        Specified by:
        createExchangeFactory in interface MessengerService
        Parameters:
        serviceName - QName of the service all exchanges created by the returned factory should be addressed to.
        Returns:
        ExchangeFactory

      • createExchangeFactory

        public ExchangeFactory createExchangeFactory(javax.xml.namespace.QName serviceName,
                                             java.lang.String endpointName)
        Creates an ExchangeFactory for creating exchanges. The exchanges will be addressed to the given service endpoint.
        Specified by:
        createExchangeFactory in interface MessengerService
        Parameters:
        serviceName - QName of the service all exchanges created by the returned factory should be addressed to.
        endpointName - Name of the endpoint all exchanges created by the returned factory should be addressed to.
        Returns:
        ExchangeFactory
